Name: Xmas Shooting - Scramble!!
About the game: On Christmas, the night of miracles, someone has stolen all the presents that were supposed to go to the children around the world. In order to get them back, Aru, the bunny-eared Santa, has taken off into the sky, following a subtle trace of the presents. Help Aru save Christmas in this humoristic, action-packed shooter set in the universe of QP Shooting - Dangerous!! Features: Meet unexpected guests on your journey to save Christmas on 3 hilarious Stages Steam version remastered for high resolutions 4 Difficulty levels - something for every player, from merely challenging to tear-jerking. 3 Play Styles - play with Orthodox, Defensive or Aggressive style, affecting the behavior of your Hyper Mode. 28 Formations to Unlock - earn points to unlock new attack formations for Aru. You can load up to 3 different ReBit formations onto the field, and switch them on the fly. Arcade and Conquest Mode - Conquest Mode saves your progress and allows you to progress a stage at a time, striving to do ever better. Replays - Save replays of your best victories and most miserable failures to study or share. Presents(?)
